Intermediate

Myocardial Infarction

Click to see definition

Intermediate

Myocardial Infarction

Definition:

Death of heart muscle tissue due to lack of blood supply, commonly known as a heart attack

Clinical Example:

Basic

Hypertension

Basic

Hypertension

Definition:

High blood pressure, defined as systolic pressure ‚â•140 mmHg or diastolic pressure ‚â•90 mmHg

Clinical Example:

Basic

Click to see definition

Basic

Arrhythmia

Definition:

Irregular heartbeat or abnormal heart rhythm

Clinical Example:

Intermediate

Atherosclerosis

Click to see definition

Intermediate

Atherosclerosis

Definition:

Hardening and narrowing of arteries due to plaque buildup

Clinical Example:

Advanced

Cardiomyopathy

Click to see definition

Advanced

Cardiomyopathy

Definition:

Disease of the heart muscle that affects its ability to pump blood effectively

Basic

Pneumonia

Click to see definition

Basic

Pneumonia

Definition:

Infection that inflames air sacs in one or both lungs, which may fill with fluid

Clinical Example:

Basic

Asthma

Click to see definition

Basic

Asthma

Definition:

Chronic respiratory condition causing airway inflammation and breathing difficulties

Advanced

Pneumothorax

Click to see definition

Advanced

Pneumothorax

Definition:

Collapsed lung caused by air leaking into the space between lung and chest wall

Basic

Bronchitis

Definition:

Inflammation of the bronchial tubes that carry air to the lungs

Advanced

Advanced

Pleural Effusion

Definition:

Abnormal accumulation of fluid in the pleural space around the lungs

Clinical Example:

Stroke

Basic

Stroke

Definition:

Sudden interruption of blood flow to the brain, causing brain tissue damage

Clinical Example:

Basic

Click to see definition

Basic

Seizure

Definition:

Sudden, uncontrolled electrical disturbance in the brain

Migraine

Definition:

Severe headache often accompanied by nausea, vomiting, and light sensitivity

Neuropathy

Definition:

Damage or dysfunction of peripheral nerves, often causing pain and numbness

Advanced

Encephalitis

Definition:

Inflammation of the brain tissue, often caused by viral infection

Definition:

Most serious type of skin cancer that develops in melanocytes

General term for skin inflammation causing redness, swelling, and itching

Autoimmune condition causing rapid skin cell turnover and scaly patches

Bacterial skin infection affecting deeper layers of skin and soft tissue

Definition:

Condition where the thyroid gland produces too much thyroid hormone

Primary adrenal insufficiency caused by destruction of the adrenal cortex

Anemia

Definition:

Condition where blood doesn't have enough healthy red blood cells or hemoglobin

Definition:

Cancer of the blood-forming tissues, including bone marrow and lymphatic system

Condition characterized by abnormally low platelet count in the blood

Condition characterized by increased red blood cell mass

Type of cancer that begins in epithelial cells lining organs and tissues

Clinical Example:

Advanced

Sarcoma

Click to see definition

Advanced

Sarcoma

Definition:

Type of cancer that develops in connective tissues like bone, muscle, or cartilage

Clinical Example:

Advanced

Lymphoma

Click to see definition

Advanced

Lymphoma

Definition:

Cancer that begins in lymphocytes (white blood cells) of the immune system

Clinical Example:

Advanced

Metastasis

Click to see definition

Advanced

Metastasis

Definition:

Spread of cancer cells from the primary tumor to distant parts of the body

Clinical Example:

Chemotherapy

Definition:

Treatment using drugs to destroy or slow the growth of cancer cells

Presence of blood in the urine

Life-threatening condition where organs don't receive adequate blood flow and oxygen

Insertion of a tube into the trachea to maintain an open airway

Medication that kills bacteria or inhibits their growth

Definition:

Fast heart rate, typically over 100 beats per minute in adults at rest
